description:
When an alien computer virus infects the platoon`s secret base, Giroro attempts to go in alone to wipe it out, only to find that he needs backup from an unexpected source. Later, Keroro enacts a nefarious invasion plan to hook the world on his K-Phone, but then discovers that the "almighty phone" has an invasion function...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giroro, A Man`s Backup / Keroro, Mobile Profit Big Plan!
ギロロ オトコのバックアップ / ケロロ お得な携帯大作戦!
